Hello,

i would like to propose a feature for the game. 

Please allow us to make maneuveur nodes when the game is paused. This would take out the stress of the game and make it more relaxing for me

Thank you!

Welcome to the forum, DerTapp.

Your suggestion has been moved to the Suggestions subforum.
The game is literally begging for this to be an option.  At the very least it should be possible in sandbox mode.
